code: import{useState}from"react";import"./InstitutionInfo.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InstitutionInfom=()=>{const institutionsData=[{name:"Sri Chaitanya College",courses:"MPC, BiPC and Arts",location:"Lakshmipuram"},{name:"VVITU - Vasireddy Venkatadri International Technological University",courses:"BTech, MTech, MBA, BBA",location:"Namburu"}];const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const[filteredInstitutions,setFilteredInstitutions]=useState(institutionsData);const handleSearch=()=>{const result=institutionsData.filter(inst=>"".concat(inst.name," ").concat(inst.courses," ").concat(inst.location).toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));setFilteredInstitutions(result);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"institution-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"page-title",children:"Institutions / Colleges"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search by name, course or location",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,children:"Search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"institution-cards",children:filteredInstitutions.length>0?filteredInstitutions.map((inst,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"institution-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:inst.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Courses:"})," ",inst.courses]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Location:"})," ",inst.location]})]},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No institutions found"})})]});};export default InstitutionInfom;
